text: ovuhu ovunge divurim sthira lesa allah mata divura taman veta sadhakayak pæmini vita e pilibanda va taman taraye visvasa karana bava pavasa sitiyaha. sæbævinma siyalu sadhakayan allah vetin yæyi (nabivaraya !) numba pavasanna. sæbævinma eva pæmini vita ovun visvasa nokaranu ætæyi numbalata vataha dunne kumakda
